question: Which woman tennis player was given the award of Cetățean de onoare ("Honorary Citizen") of the city of Bucharest in 2018?
explanation: Simona Halep, a Romanian professional tennis player and currently World No. 1 has been awarded the Title of Honorary Citizen of Bucharest in 2018. It is the highest civilian distinction which rewards the talent and other special contributions of a person, Romanian or foreign and is granted by General Council of Bucharest.
